page.title: 17POINTS OF VIEW IN MISSON
page.content: Most people in Misson are quite happy living here but a few would like certain changes.We went around interviewing the local people about living here and asking them if they would like any changes. Some would like a better bus service,somewhere for the children play,more things going on,a docter in the village,a supermarket,a few people commented about the roads which need mending in parts, and the older people don't like the stiles along the river bank and it stops them walking,1 or 2 people living near the factory which dries crops (Misson Feeds And Storage)complain about the dust and dirt which blew around the farm,it and a few people saud that the village was too isolated.
